jcr:content.jcr:title: G610 - Raylan Cherry Brown / Red / Blue
jcr:content.searchTitle: G610 Orion Brown Backlit Mechanical Gaming Keyboard
jcr:content.seoDescription: G610 Orion Red Backlit Mechanical Gaming Keyboard features Cherry Brown key switches. Crafted for gamers, you can customize the backlighting and functions.
jcr:content.seoPageTitle: Logitech G610 Orion Brown Mechanical Keyboard/Cherry Brown keys

media_tile_copy.text: G610 Orion starts with the same performance-driven design and integrates powerful gaming technologies. From the finest details, like fingerprint-masking matte texture and durable braided cable, to the most intricate, each aspect is precisely engineered to bring Logitech G’s industry-leading technology and quality of construction to the uniquely crafted form.

media_tile_copy_copy_69503716.altText: G610 Backlit Mechanical Gaming Keyboard Orion Brown
media_tile_copy_copy_69503716.featureTitle: Your Choice of Cherry MX Brown, Blue, or Red or Mechanical Switches
media_tile_copy_copy_69503716.text:
Cherry MX mechanical switches are the gold standard in mechanical keyboards. Mechanical switches last longer and are more consistent in feel and responsiveness than rubber dome keyboards.

  • Cherry MX Red are low-noise with a linear keypress for smooth, rapid-fire actuation.

  • Cherry MX Brown switches are low-noise but have a tactile bump for feedback when pressed.

  • Cherry MX Blue switches have a tactile bump as well as an audible click.*

All three are rated to over 50 million keystrokes and actuate precisely for a reliable gaming experience.

*Media controls do not use mechanical switches.

media_tile_copy_copy_419134458.text: Choose your level of customization by selecting and personalizing each individual key light with LGS. Keep track of multiple commands by customizing the light up keys. Logitech Gaming software can also synchronize light patterns with other Logitech G devices.

media_tile_copy_copy_1858520555.altText: G610 Backlit Mechanical Gaming Keyboard Red
media_tile_copy_copy_1858520555.text: Stay in your game while you control your background track. G610 keyboards feature dedicated media controls that can be used to play, pause, and mute music and videos instantly. Skip to the next song with the touch of a button, or use the roller to adjust the volume.

media_tile_copy_copy_314101553.altText: G610 Backlit Mechanical Gaming Keyboard Orion Brown
media_tile_copy_copy_314101553.text: Gain full control of the G610 with Logitech Gaming Software. Assign custom button macros on F1 through F12 to customize your favorite game. You also get full control of per-key backlighting and can customize which keys are turned off when you turn on game mode. (By default, Game Mode disables the Windows key.)

media_tile_copy_copy_1560154291.altText: G610 Backlit Mechanical Gaming Keyboard Orion Brown
media_tile_copy_copy_1560154291.text: Execute every complex move exactly right, every time, with multi-key input. With 26-key rollover, you can press a number of keys plus modifier keys (Control, Alt, Shift) in any order and still get exactly what you intended.

media_tile_copy_copy.altText: G610 Backlit Mechanical Gaming Keyboard Red
media_tile_copy_copy.text: Three step angle adjustments (0, 4, or 8 degrees) allows you to set your keyboard at an angle that feels just right for you and your style. Rubber feet keep your keyboard stable during intense gaming action.

Windows® 10, Windows 8.1, Windows 8, Windows 7

Powered USB port

Internet connection for optional software download
